item.title: After Captain America: Brave New World, I Think I've Worked Out Why Bucky Barnes Is The Only Thunderbolts* Member Not Wearing A Superhero Suit
item.description: Bucky Barnes is the only Thunderbolts* member that doesn't wear a super-suit, and I think Captain America: Brave New World provides the reason why.

item.title: Mamma Mia! Star Explains Why The Third Movie Is Taking So Long
item.description: Amanda Seyfried explains why Mamma Mia! 3 is taking so long, sharing insights on delays, Universal’s priorities, and the cast’s eagerness to return.

item.title: The Story Of Thunderbolts* Already Looks Even More Exciting 2 Months Before Its Debut Thanks To Daredevil: Born Again's Major MCU Changes
item.description: Daredevil: Born Again's major status quo changes to the MCU have me even more excited for Thunderbolts* and how the two projects may intersect.
